faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have other questions? Please contact our support team.

items.title: How to use the Rent Receipt Generator?
items.description: Simply fill in the basic information (landlord name, tenant name, property address, etc.), select a template style, and generate professional rent receipts with one click.

items.title: Are the generated receipts legally compliant?
items.description: Yes, our receipt templates comply with relevant legal requirements and can be used for official purposes.

items.title: Can I generate receipts for multiple months at once?
items.description: Yes, the system supports batch generation, allowing you to generate receipts for multiple months simultaneously, greatly improving work efficiency.

items.title: How is data security ensured?
items.description: All receipt generation is completed locally, and we do not store any of your information, ensuring data security.

items.title: What makes this Rent Receipt Generator special?
items.description: Our rent receipt generator stands out with its user-friendly interface, professional templates, and secure local processing. It's the perfect tool for generating compliant rent receipts quickly.
